newsitem.title: PERU: Blast damages Peru power firm, no injuries - radio.
newsitem.headline: Blast damages Peru power firm, no injuries - radio.

text.p: A bomb exploded outside the offices of a Peruvian electric company in northern Lima, causing heavy damage to the building but causing no injuries, local radio said late on Tuesday.

Radioprogramas del Peru, quoting witnesses, said the bomb exploded at Edelnor in northern Lima shortly after 11 p.m. local time (0400 GMT), destroying the building's front door, shattering windows and damaging furniture and equipment inside.
